summary:
Please NOTE!!! TWO of those pictures are my version with dark hair and vamperisim, because YES you can load her into CK and edit her TOO!

this is my second mod so before you bother with negitive comments just think... im not FORCING you to use her
descriptionHtml:
For you Negitive and complaining little girls.....

I present Apachii, the most common hair mod for skyrim::

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

I present True Brows, the most common brow mod for skyrim::

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?

And Also... IF you dont mind, my SECOND EVER mod::
( Still Learning so STOP BITCHING )

Morwenn the (ALMOST) standalone Marriable Follower ::

Found in the Sleeping Giant Inn in river wood, the beautiful Morween:

-Has Trade Dialogue etc
-Levels with the player
-Is voiced with lydia's voice for more dialogue
-Is Marriable (after this has a shop AND will cook your meals)


Morwenn Is an ideal first follower, or maybe even more,
She Favors frost magic and conjuration though, being that she is found at a low level, you may find her skills are...
directable using the right mods such as UFO.

This Mod REQUIRES:
-Skyrim.esm
-Update.esm
-Dawnguard.esm
-Hearthfire.esm
-Dragonborn.esm
-Apachiihair.esm AND Apachiihairfemales.esm ( though i believe it may work without these she will not look the same )
-Truebrows.esp ( though i believe it may work without these she will not look the same )

This mod was MADE using:
Calenties CBBE body ( SLFC_CBBE_HDT_AG)
Racemenu 3.3.0
Apachii Hairs
True Brows

Thank you to betha for the Skyrim game and letting us mod it,
Thanks of cause to the authors of any of the above mods, Morwenn is pretty because of you

Using Morwenn in your mod?
I am not agaisnt he idea as long as you remember where she came from

INSTALLATION :: Simply drop the esp in your load order and activate

Compatibility --- No known issues
author: Demonikone
